author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Classic Sticky Pork Ribs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Sticky Pork Ribs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C (Gas 6). To make the sauce, put the honey, mustard, tomato ketchup, soy sauce, paprika, and olive oil in a bowl. Season generously with salt and black pepper, and mix well.
Smother the ribs with the sauce, then sit them in a roasting tin and cook for 2530 minutes until well charred. Serve with pitta bread and a crisp green salad.
